definition: COVID-19, the coronavirus disease identified in 2019

pinyin: fei4 yan2 Ke4 lei2 bo2 shi4 jun1

sentences.english: Flexible bronchoscope diagnosis and treatment of mycoplasma pneumonia in children.
sentences.chinese: 儿童支原体肺炎的纤维支气管镜诊治研究。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of KeAn buccal tablets in treating childrens MP pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察咳安含片治疗小儿支原体肺炎的临床作用。

sentences.english: SARS struck both China and some other counties in 2003 .
sentences.chinese: 2003年非典型肺炎袭击了中国和其他几个国家。

sentences.english: A cold predisposes a person to pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 感冒易使患者感染肺炎。

sentences.english: After in hospital, inspects discovered that what the baby contracts is the pneumococcal bronchopneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 入院后检查发现宝宝患的是肺炎球菌性支气管肺炎。

sentences.english: After in hospital, inspects discovered that what the baby contracts is the pneumococcal bronchopneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 入院后检查发现宝宝患的是肺炎球菌性支气管肺炎。

sentences.english: Usual Interstitial Pneumonitis (UIP) is a histologic diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 普通性间质性肺炎是组织学诊断。

sentences.english: Of the 14.5 million pneumococcal cases, 95% were attributable to pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 95%的链球菌疾病可归因于肺炎。

sentences.english: Antibiotics should be prescribed to treat eye and ear infections, and pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 出现眼耳部感染以及肺炎时，应使用抗菌素治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of radiology and CT scanning in Klebsiella pneumoniae.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价影像学在克雷伯杆菌肺炎的诊断方面的价值。

sentences.english: Can continuous pump feeding reduce the incidence of pneumonia in nasogastric tube-fed patients?A randomized controlled trial.
sentences.chinese: 持续泵入喂养能否减少鼻饲患者肺炎发生率？

sentences.english: She almost conked out when she caught pneumonia last year.
sentences.chinese: 她去年得了肺炎，差点儿死掉。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical characteristics of hospital acquired pneumonia caused by Acinetobacter baumannii.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鲍曼不动杆菌医院获得性肺炎的临床特点。

sentences.english: You may develop complications of the flu, such as bronchitis or pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 流感并发症可能还会变成加重成支气管炎或肺炎。

sentences.english: Half a month after Jiang Hao's death, Jiang Chunyang came down with acute pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 儿子走后半个月，姜春阳突发急性肺炎。

sentences.english: This Gram-positive oval-shaped bacterium is one of the causes of pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 这种椭圆形的革兰氏阳性菌可能引起肺炎。

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
